content: <CoRIS>  <Local-number>2002 </Local-number>  <Title>U.S Caribbean Regional Fisheries Workshop </Title>  <Publication-Date><caldate>2002 </caldate></Publication-Date>  <Abstract>Within the context of the overarching theme of what is the coral reef ecosystem and its importance, presented three main themes and made recommendations: 1) Federal and Commonwealth Fishing Regulations and Licensing; 2) Boating Regulations and Licensing; and 3) Diving and Hyperbaric Chamber. </Abstract>  <Meeting-Date>September 30-October 1, 2002 </Meeting-Date>  <Location>San Juan, Puerto Rico </Location>  <Proceedings-Title>Summary Recommendations </Proceedings-Title>  <Sponsor>NOAA Fisheries Southeast Region Habitat Conservation Division as part of NOAA Coral Reef Conservation Program </Sponsor>  <URL>http://nsgl.gso.uri.edu/pru/pruw02001.pdf </URL>  <Date-Time-Last-Modified>19700101000000 </Date-Time-Last-Modified>  <Region>PR </Region>  <Bounding>  <Eastbc>-65.248715 </Eastbc>  <Westbc>-67.399870 </Westbc>  <Southbc>17.784130 </Southbc>  <Northbc>18.645740 </Northbc>  </Bounding>  <CoRIS-Record-Type>proceedings </CoRIS-Record-Type>  <Local-subject-index>proceedings </Local-subject-index>  <Local-subject-index>publication </Local-subject-index>  <resdesc>CoRIS Bibliographic </resdesc> </CoRIS>
